K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-1: d'a ki n'i sarba tsitta aa dva ya aatsinta dzny'a na badzra b'a r'a hi aa dhi bha ba tantra r'a dza n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-3: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-4: mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-6: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-7: bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-8: gti mug 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-9: nga rgyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-11: phrag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539a-13: yu ma m'a ma k'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-0: yum dam tshig @539b sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-1: yum kun tu bzang mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-2: de rnams kyi bha ga la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-8: sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-15: sa ma ya d'a ki n'i dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-16: bi shva d'a ki n'i dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-22: gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor [?] dang bcas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-24: lha ma srin sde brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-25: 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:539b-26: yang de'i tshe na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gra ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540a-15: ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540a-16: bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540a-17: rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540a-18: bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540a-26: kha sbub zhabs rdol dri ma can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540b-12: tshe gcig 'bras bu sangs rgyas de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540b-22: des na lta ba dang por bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540b-23: phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540b-24: nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:540b-29: nyon mongs sreg pa lta ba'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-2: ngos bzung med pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-3: 'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-4: de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-6: ri bo lta bur shes par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-7: g-yo 'gul med pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-8: rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-9: gsal la ma 'dres lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-10: 'ja' tshon lta bur shes par gyis; ;gnyis su med pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-11: ga pur lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-12: de nas yang gsang bas tshig 'di gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-13: zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-14: seng ge lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-15: nyam nga med pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-16: glang chen lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-17: stobs dang ldan pa lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-18: rta mchog lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-19: kun tu rgyug pa lta ba'i mchog stag mo lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-20: 'jigs pa med pa lta ba'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-22: de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-26: byang chub sems de nag por snang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541a-32: byang chub sems de ljang khur shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-0: @541b de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-1: dus gsum snang ba lta ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-2: rnam par snang mdzad lta bur shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-3: chos nyid don la rtag sems pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-5: thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-6: rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-7: chos can so sor ma 'dres pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-8: snang ba mtha' yas lta bur shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-9: sna tshogs snang la ma 'dres pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:541b-10: don yod grub pa lta bur shar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542a-17: kun la brtse ba sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542a-21: kun la khyab ba sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-7: go cha sbyor ba sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-12: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-13: nyon mongs mi spong sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-21: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-22: me long ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:542b-24: mnyam nyid ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543a-2: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543a-24: bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-14: rigs dan lta bu'i spyod pa bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-21: ngur pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-23: khva ta lta bu'i spyod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-24: dug lnga spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-27: khu byug lta bu'i spyod pa bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-34: dom bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-35: mtshan mo rgyu ba spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:543b-36: zhag mig can gyi spyod pa bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-0: snang ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog @544a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-2: de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-4: nor bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-5: sman dug gnyid med spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-6: ga pur lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-7: cis kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-8: rdo rje lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-9: mi mthun gcod ba spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-10: ral gri lta bur shes par bya; ;de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-11: thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-12: mda' gzhu lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-13: stong pa'i kha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-14: shak ti lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-15: 'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-16: mdung thung lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-17: nga bdag gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-18: sta re lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-19: gdul bya 'dren pa spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-20: lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-21: dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-22: grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-23: de 'dra'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya cher rtogs byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-24: de nyid sems kyi khyad par mthong gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-25: brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-26: sems nyid gnyis kyi gnad dang ma bral na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-27: brtul zhugs sbyad kyang sdug bsngal sna tshogs skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-28: bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-29: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544a-30: thogs pa med ba phyag rgya chen po de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-0: skye ba 'di la sangs @544b rgyas sa la reg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-2: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-3: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-4: ston ba la ni 'di skad gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-5: yang dag brda ni brda chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-6: kun gyis mi rtog sbas ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-7: bar chad sel ba brda yi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-8: bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-9: de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-10: snang ba thams cad las kyi brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-11: tshig ni ji snyed ngag gi barda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-12: de la bsam gyis mi khyab gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-13: don gyi brda ru shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-14: de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-15: gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-16: dpa' po brtag pa'i rim pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-17: phyag rgya mo yi brtag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-18: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-19: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-20: rnal 'byor phag mo rdzogs byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-21: brda yi bye brag ji snyed pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-25: sbas pa'i barda ni bshad bya ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-27: g-yon pa shes rab rang bzhin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-28: lus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-29: mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-30: lag pa g-yon pa bstan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:544b-31: sa ro zhes ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-0: rkang pa grong khyer sa bgrod @545a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-1: pas; ;spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-2: go ba'i phyir nas rkang bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-3: aa ghu la zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-4: srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi rtsa [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-5: de yi phyir na de bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-6: shes rab chen por go bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-7: bha ta ri zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-8: lce yis zas kyi ro myong ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-9: stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-10: lce bstan tsarya gha zhes brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-11: skal bar ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-12: yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-13: lto ba zas kyi snod bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-14: aan bha li zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-15: lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-16: de bzhin snod ni bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-17: bla ma'i brgyud pa go cha'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-18: pam ka ta zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-19: sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-20: lnga yi rtsa ba ae bam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-21: bsdus phyir sor mo lnga bstan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-23: gang gis so ni bstan byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-25: so yi stobs kyis zas 'dul ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-26: ae bam ji bzhin rtogs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-27: gang gis so ni bstan byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-28: tsa la ni zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-29: byin pas lus kyi stobs bskyed ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-30: goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-31: go phyin pa ni bstan byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-32: me ga pa zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-34: 'bras bu dam tshig gis bsten ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-35: sa gzhi gru bzhing bstan byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-36: man dal zhes su brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-37: sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545a-38: phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-0: g-yas pa'i sor mo lnga @545b bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-1: spha ra na zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-2: mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-3: rgyas gdab gnyis ni go bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-4: dbugs ni la ni dbyung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-5: dpa' kun sham zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-6: so 'cha' ba yi zhe sdang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-7: 'bras pu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-8: gnyis snang gcod phyir so 'cha' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-9: ma ta khra zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-10: sha ni srog chags thams cad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-11: 'byung zhing chos rnams thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-12: sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-13: ra tsa na zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-14: khro gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-15: bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-16: rtags yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-17: ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-18: bsdums pas dbye ba med pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-20: bha ga ni zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-21: dpe yis mtshon pa'i don du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-22: dri ma kun las grol ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-23: bsdams pa bkrol nas gre nan brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-24: byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-25: thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-26: sna tshogs snang ba'i chos kun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-27: bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-28: gtor ma btang la hi ka ka brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-29: lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-30: sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-31: don du lto ba bstan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-32: ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-33: de rnams phan yon dang yid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-34: snying po rgyud du gsal bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:545b-35: brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-2: longs spyod ba ni thabs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-3: byin gyis brlabs dang sa bon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-4: rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-5: dpag med rim gyis phan yon 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-6: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-7: lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-8: bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:546a-9: mtheb srin ae yi drang ro gcig //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-15: phrag dog can gyi gang zag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-16: phrin las phag mo ljang khu bstan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-17: phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-18: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-19: he ru ka la tshig 'di gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-20: dug lnga shas che gang zag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-21: 'bras bu bu sku lnga ni ji ltar thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-22: ye shes lnga ni ji ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-23: rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-24: khro mo lnga ni ji ltar bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-25: 'khor lo lnga ni ji ltar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-26: snying po lnga ni ji ltar bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-27: dam tshig lnga ni ji ltar bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-28: nyams myong lnga ni ji ltar 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-29: nyon mongs lnga ni ji ltar 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-30: ye shes lnga ni ji ltar 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-31: grangs kyi tshad ni ji ltar bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-32: mtshan ma'i rtags ni ji ltar 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-33: dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-34: las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-36: de nas dpa' bo he ru kas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:549b-37: thugs rab tu dgyes te brda'i tshig 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-1: nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-2: dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-3: 'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-4: kun la khyab pa chos sku dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-5: theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-6: gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-7: cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-8: ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-9: skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-10: thob pa'i don la goms par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-12: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-13: thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-14: spros bral chos dbyings ye shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-15: me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-16: bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-17: gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-18: phrin las mthar phyin bya ba rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-19: ye shes lnga ni ni de ltar skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-20: gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-21: dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-22: rigs ni rnam pa lnga thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-23: spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-25: skyon gyis ma gos padma'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-26: sems can don grub las kyi rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-27: gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-28: dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-29: ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-30: bde ba skye ba sku yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-31: bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-32: nus pa 'byung ba gsung yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550a-33: dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-0: @550b rtogs tshad 'char ba thugs yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-1: khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-2: brtan par byed pa yon tan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-3: ser mo don grub bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-4: bar chad sel ba phrin las te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-5: sna tshogs mthar phyin bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-6: rim gyis ma yin cig car yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-7: rgya dang 'bur gyi tshul du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-8: yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-9: spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-10: bde byed sku yi yi ge bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-11: rang bzhin rtsa yi gzugs can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-12: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-13: gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-14: rang bzhin rtsa yi tshul du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-15: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-16: thags mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-17: rtsa yi dbyibs dang mthun par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-18: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-19: rten byed yon tan yi ge bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-20: de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-21: phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-22: zhi rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-23: las dang rjes mthun gzugs su gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-24: snying po lnga yi bzlas thebs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-25: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-26: phrin las bzhi yi tshul du bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-27: dam tshig lnga yi bsrung tshul ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-28: bde chen dkar mo'i dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-29: sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-30: khros ma nag mo'i dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-31: drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa bya; ;ser mo don grub dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-32: dngos po kun la chags med bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-33: dmar po sgra sgrogs dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-34: smra zhing bud med bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:550b-35: sna tshogs mthar phyin dam tshig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-0: @551a *// rgyud cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-1: mkha' 'gro spyi yi dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-2: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-3: rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-4: bza' ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-5: gsang sngags spyod pas bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-6: de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-7: go rims skye tshul 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-8: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-9: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-10: chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-11: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-12: thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-13: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin; ;chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-15: dngos po gang la'ang thogs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-16: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-17: nyon mongs lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-18: gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-19: zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-20: nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-22: phrag dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-23: de nas 'gyur ba lam du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-24: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-25: sku yi yi ge rnam bzhi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-26: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-27: gsung gi yi ge rnam bzhi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-28: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-29: thugs kyi yi ge rnam bzhi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551a-31: yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-0: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye @551b shes 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-1: phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-2: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-3: a'a li dang ni k'a li yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-4: sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-6: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste; ;grangs kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-7: 'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs rnams skrod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-8: 'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer skrod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-11: 'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-13: 'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas khang g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-17: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-18: mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-19: skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-20: ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-21: mngon sum dag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-22: dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-23: las 'phro can gyi snang ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-24: skal pa 'bring gi gang zag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-25: ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-26: rang gi las dang gang mthun par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-27: rmi lam dag tu mchog tu gsel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-28: skal ba 'bring gi mtshan ltas yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-29: skal pa dman pa'i gang zag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:551b-30: tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-2: bar ma do nas lam sna 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-3: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-4: dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-5: rab la skad cig rnam drug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-6: 'bring la zla ba drug gis grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-7: tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-8: phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-9: rnam pa gsum du shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-10: las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-11: rgyas dang bsdus pa shin tu rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-12: rnam pa gsum du shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-13: bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes gzung gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-14: rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-15: shin tu rgyas pa thun mong brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-16: de las 'phros pa nyi shu lnga; ;bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-17: zhi ba'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-18: ser mo don grub ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-19: rgyas pa'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-20: dmar po sgra sgrogs ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-21: dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-22: khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-23: drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-24: sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-25: phrin las bzhi yi las rnams 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-26: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-27: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552a-28: ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-0: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad @552b zhus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-1: skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-2: bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-3: sku dang mchod rten ji ltar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-4: de yi go rims bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-6: de nas ston pas bka' stsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-7: nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-8: rigs can lnga yi gang zag des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-9: bdag don gzhan don byed 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-10: sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-11: rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rim lnga; ;lnga tshan lnga ru shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-12: de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-13: de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-14: dang po bdag gi de nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-15: gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-16: gsum pa 'bras bu'i de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-17: dang po po bdag gi de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-18: de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-19: dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-20: sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-21: 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-22: gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-23: rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-24: sa gzhi dkar zhing snum pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-25: rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-26: lnga tshan lnga ni legs sbyar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-27: lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-28: sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-29: 'og min gnas nas sbyan drangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-30: rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-31: de nas mnga' gsol na bza' gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-32: de la mchod dang bstod pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-33: bzhugs su gsol ba'i rim pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-34: dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-36: dang po bdag gi de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:552b-37: rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:553a-3: 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:553a-4: gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:553a-5: rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:553a-6: sa gzhi ser la 'cher ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:553a-7: gong du bstan pa ji lta bar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-0: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu @554a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-2: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsad pa'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-3: kye kye mgon po bdag la gson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-4: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-5: nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-6: rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-7: dus gsum kun tu sdug bsngal bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-8: de yi gnyen po bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-9: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-10: rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-11: rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-12: de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar bsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-13: phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-14: de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-15: legs nyes kun gyi stangs gcod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-16: mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-17: de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu; ;nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-18: de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-19: bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-20: de las rgyal ba'i thabs cig zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-21: lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der; ;de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-22: de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-23: rgyu 'bras kun tu sdug bsngal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-24: ma lus dbyer med shes gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-25: sdug bsngal ma lus bde bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-26: gzhan yang thun mong 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-27: phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-28: phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554a-29: nyes legs kun gyi stangs gcod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-1: mna' las rnam par rgyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-2: nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-3: bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-4: bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-5: dgra las rnam par rgyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-6: lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-7: rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-8: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-9: de nas mgon po he ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-10: gsang sngags kyi sdud pa mo rab tu dga' ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-11: 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang de ltar dga' mgu yi rangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-12: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-13: mgon po thugs rje dang ldan pas; ;bdag dang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-14: 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-15: thugs rjes gnang ba bka' drin lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-16: zhes dga' mgu yi rang te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-080-007:554b-18: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs pa rdzogs so //
